title: Solaris Express Developer Edition 1/08 [DVD] [i386]
description:
Solaris Express Developer Edition


Welcome to the Solaris Express Developer Edition DVD!

Solaris Express Developer Edition is a free, quarterly release of Sun&#039;s
next generation Solaris Operating System built from the source code
repository at OpenSolaris.org. The release includes the latest tools,
technologies, and platforms to create applications for the
Solaris OS, Java Application Platforms, and Web 2.0.

To quickly determine if your machine is able to run
this version of Solaris Express, run the Sun Device Detection
Tool. This tool is available in "sddtool" directory on the DVD. 
Alternately, you can find the most current version of the
Sun Device Detection Tool at the following url :
    <a href=" http://www.sun.com/bigadmin/hcl/hcts/device_detect.jsp" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.sun.com/bigadmin/hcl/hcts/device_detect.jsp</a>

For Windows systems double-click the jar file to run the program. 
For more information refer to "SDDTool_ReadMe.txt" in that directory.

For hardware requirements, disk partitioning information,
and other pre-install steps to ensure optimal performance,
please visit:
    <a href=" http://developers.sun.com/solaris/articles/getting_started_guide.html" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://developers.sun.com/solaris/articles/getting_started_guide.html</a>

The Solaris Express Developer Edition DVD will install its
contents onto your system. To accomplish this, you will
need to shutdown your system and then boot from the DVD.

For additional information about Solaris Express Developer Edition,
including FAQs, documentation, community forums, training, and
Sun Support services, please visit:
 <a href="
http://developers.sun.com/sxde" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://developers.sun.com/sxde</a>
